name: Corn Clicker
description:
A game about clicking a bag of corn.

Upgrades:

  Clicker: Automatically clicks le corn for you

  Pig: Every pig means you get 1 extra corn per click

  Seed: Will take a while to grow and harvest more corn

  Scarecrow: Every scarecrow means bonus harvest per seed grown

  Rain: Makes seeds grow faster

(Also pig and clicker have limits of 360 to prevent lag, nothing else is because i forgor)
